de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.Core.Board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for the Board, its kind of a Interface between the FlattenedBoard and other Classes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Constructor for the Board Generates all start Entities and insert them in the Container At first a Big WALL around the field is generated After that it gets the start Values, for how much Entities are needed from the BoardConfig.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FlattenedBoard flatten()
      Generates the 2D Field, its a other form of an update because the old one isn't used after that anymore
      EntityContainer getContainer()
      Get the actual Container and its Entities
      void getHighscore() 
      int getNextID()
      Generates a new ID.

      Generates a random Position on the Field.

      Get the Size of the Field

      Get the Information if a Position is empty

      Start the next Round.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()
        Constructor for the Board Generates all start Entities and insert them in the Container At first a Big WALL around the field is generated After that it gets the start Values, for how much Entities are needed from the BoardConfig. Then it spawns them at a random Position on the field

    • Method Detail

      • getNextID

        public int getNextID()
        Generates a new ID. Every ID is unique so every Object has its own
        Returns:
        The ID as Int

      • getRandomPos

        public XY getRandomPos()
        Generates a random Position on the Field. If the generated Position is already occupied a new Position is generated
        Returns:
        The random Position as XY Object

      • flatten

        public FlattenedBoard flatten()
        Generates the 2D Field, its a other form of an update because the old one isn't used after that anymore
        Returns:
        The new Field

      • update

        public void update()
        Start the next Round. All Entity movements are executed

      • getSize

        public XY getSize()
        Get the Size of the Field
        Returns:
        The Size as XY Object, but in this Case they aren't Coordinates but Length and Width.

      • getContainer

        public EntityContainer getContainer()
        Get the actual Container and its Entities
        Returns:
        The Entity Array.

      • isPositionEmpty

        public boolean isPositionEmpty(XY pos)
        Get the Information if a Position is empty
        Parameters:
        pos - The Position which has to be checked as XY Object
        Returns:
        A Boolean true or false

        public void getHighscore()
